dict.acceptation: 同盟，联盟；协会，工会；联合，团结；

sent.orig: Union- (not fixed) : For all the Union's players, this lock level bit more difficult.
sent.trans: 联盟-（不固定）：对所有联盟玩家来说，这个开锁等级有点难度。

sent.orig: There's also the old difficulty of persuading all European Union countries act union.
sent.trans: 还有一个问题是欧盟中很难采取一致行动。

sent.orig: On January 1, 1999, The European Union will start to use European Monetary Union (Ecu).
sent.trans: 1999年1月1日，欧盟将正式启动欧元。

sent.orig: He have applied for trade union membership or he have applied to join a trade union.
sent.trans: 他已申请成为工会成员或他已申请加入工会。

sent.orig: Southerns threaten Southerners threatened to leaving leave the union Union unless southern southern rights were protected.
sent.trans: 南方则威胁说如果南方权利得不到保护的话将脱离联邦。
